events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because it is not what I paid for.
The system has detected keywords related to refund and has therefore categorized the issue as a Refund.
Your case has been assigned to an agent who specializes in handling refund requests for order discrepancies.

Here is my order number 123456789 and attached is a photo showing the item is completely different from the description on the website.
We apologize for the mistake. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method immediately and you do not need to return the incorrect item.
Thank you for the quick response and the refund offer. I appreciate not having to return the item, that makes this much easier.
The refund has now been processed successfully. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect on your account.

Since the refund has been confirmed and no additional help is required, we are now closing your support case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to collect your feedback on how we handled your refund request and overall experience.
